newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turkish central bank reserve falls last week.
newsitem.headline: Turkish central bank reserve falls last week.

text.p: The Turkish central bank said on Thursday its foreign currency reserve fell by $45 million to $16.313 billion in the week ending January 24.
Gross international reserves, including gold and commercial bank holdings, fell by $540 million to $27.235 billion in the week ending January 10, the bank said.
